Original:
今日在本店光顧後只有黑店能形容

在點餐時服務的人因為沒有菜單所以我們接受了店員的推薦飲品，當我們點完一杯子詢問完一杯價錢後就急忙跑走不讓我們詢問完其它的價錢，到這邊都覺得還好，但是店內只有兩組客人真的有這麼急嗎？
最讓人生氣的是本來就已經在點餐時和我們告知，今日因為廚房整修所以不開伙，所以特例今天可以叫外食
之後用餐到一半又跑來說有內用餐點可以點，我們點了兩份餐點
最後結帳時才和我說因為我們點外食要按照人頭收取每人50元清潔費
我回應店家說：我覺得完全不合理，這種事情不是該在告知我們可以叫外食的時候就該說了嗎？
店家給的回應竟然是：以為我們有點他們的食物所以以為我們沒點外送就沒有告知，這個邏輯到底在哪？
當我表明我覺得完全不合理不想付這個清潔費以後店家態度非常差的說：反正是小錢啦吼不跟你們收沒關係
正當我以為終於結束以後，再三確認付款金額是1180使用線上支付出來的價錢是卻是1298？
付完的價錢又跟原本說好的不一樣？
得到的回應卻是：一間餐廳收10%服務費很正常吧？
又一次什麼都不講，沒有 菜單 沒有 標示 沒有人員告知莫名奇妙的又要被多收錢，只有黑店能形容

整體下來餐點的飲品和人員介紹的味道與口感完全不一致，整個用餐體驗下來 非常差
今日最滿意的應該就是外送來的烤串是最好吃的^_^
EN:
Only black shops can be described as a black shop after patronizing today

Because there is no menu at the time of ordering, we have received the recommended drink from the clerk. When we ordered a cup to ask about a cup, we hurriedly run away from letting us ask for other prices. , But are there only two groups of guests in the store really so anxious?
The most angry thing is that I have already told us when ordering that the kitchen is renovated, so I can’t open it.
After half of the meal, there is a meal to order. We ordered two meals.
At the end of the checkout, I told me that I had to charge a clean fee of 50 yuan per person according to the person's head.
I responded to the store and said: I think it is completely unreasonable. Should I say that this kind of thing should be said when we can tell me food?
The response given by the store turned out to be: I thought we were a bit their food, so we thought we didn't tell me if we didn't order the delivery. Where is this logic?
When I show that I feel that I do n’t want to pay this cleaning fee at all, after I do n’t want to pay this cleaning fee, the store's attitude is very poor: Anyway, it ’s a small money.
Just after I thought it was finally over, it repeatedly confirmed that the payment amount was used by 1180 to use online but 1298?
The price is different from what was said?
The response to get is: It is normal to charge a 10%service fee for a restaurant?
I did n’t say anything again. There is no menu and no person to tell the inexplicable and wonders and be collected. Only black shops can describe it.

The taste introduced by the drink and the personnel of the meal is completely inconsistent with the taste. The whole meal experience is very bad.
The most satisfied thing today is that the baking skewers sent out is the best^_^
